name: Asphodel Meadows
description:
You are Sothis, a lost woman who seems to have forgotten her origin. You wake up in this strange space unknowing your adventure just started. Vicious creature lurk to put an end to her life and the only help comes from the Grim Reaper. However is he one with us or one of many foes lying to us?

Team:

ProgrammersArtistsSoundDoggieBalloonMerly23Antony Arcoíris (antonyski)
InherentlyGloomy
AgentAPM
Jordan!Willowblade

Controls

  • Arrow keys: movement
  • Space: jump
  • Shift: dash when unlocked
  • V: attack

Jam

Due to inconveniences with our past coder, who deleted the entire code, we couldn't fully work on it and we only had a week to create everything. We had to cut some mechanics and enemies to make it in time, but feel like we did well with the redesigned scope.

Post-jam updates currently planned:

  • Fix all bugs that pop up during jam
  • Add boss audio
  • Make level more interesting
  • New mushrooms with spitting attacks, and a mini-boss!
  • Add small rooms with new content.

Enjoy and let us know your experience! If you wish donate to show your love and support for this project: https://www.patreon.com/Merly23
